name: Sonarr
short_description: Smart PVR for TV show monitoring and automated downloading with Usenet and BitTorrent.
description: Smart PVR for TV show monitoring and automated downloading with Usenet and BitTorrent. Sonarr is a self-hosted application focused on media, tools, torrent, download. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Sonarr on your home server to smart pvr for tv show monitoring and automated downloading with usenet and bittorrent without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Sonarr to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
